data.title: $150.00 - Luxembourg American Heritage Information Center
data.text: No 5467 ISSUED BY THE $150.00 Luxemburger Brotherhood of America INCORPORATED AS A BENEVOLENT ASSOCIATION DECEMBER 8, 1888 Section No. INCORPORATED AS AN INSURANCE ORGANIZATION MAY 21, 1902 This Certificate, issued by the Luxemburger Brotherhood of America, upon the life of located at a Member of WITNESSETH, That in consideration of the statements and representations made by the assured in writing in his application for membership, and the answers and representations made by said assured to the Medical Examiner (said medical examination and the record thereof and the said application for membership being here referred to and made a part of this contract), the said Luxemburger Brotherhood of America agrees to pay to. the beneficiary designated by said assured in his application, upon due proof of the death of said assured, he being in good standing in the Order, the sum of One Hundred-Fifty Dollars The said assured expressly agreeing to pay all assessments, dues and fines assessed against him, according to the Laws, Rules and Regulations of the said l.UXEMBURGER BROTHERHOOD OF AMERICA which may now or hereafter govern the Order; provided, however, that due proof of the right of the person or persons claiming the benefit hereby agreed to he paid to the same shall always be required before the same is paid. It is hereby expressly stipulated that should any of the statements or representations made by the said assured in his application and medical examination hereinbefore referred to be false or fraudulent in any material particular, then this certificate is to be null, void and of no force or effect whatever. The beneficiaries shall indorse their receipt in full on this Certificate and surrender the same upon the receipt of the amount hereby agreed to be paid upon the death of the assured. Said assured shall have the right, during his membership in the Order, to surrender this Certificate and receive a new one, and may substitute another beneficiary or beneficiaries therein if he so desires, by complying with the Laws of the Order upon this subject. And it is expressly understood that this is a contract between the Luxemburger Brotherhood of America and assured alone, and not a contract between said Brotherhood and the beneficiaries herein named. This Certificate is not valid unless countersigned by the President and Secretary of Section No.. In Testimony. Whereof, The said Brotherhood has caused its corporate seal and the signatures of its Grand President and Grand Secretary to be hereunto affixed at / this day of.... 19- GRAND SECRETARY -GRAND PRESIDENT Countersigned by the President and Secretary of. . . Section No â€¢ at Secretary. I hereby agree to all the conditions set out in the above Certificate. this WITNESSES Dated and signed by me at. State of. day of 19. State of. 19. State of. this. day President.
